entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 30 percent chance of showers late this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight except 40 over exposed coastal sections. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Showers. High 6.
